newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai stocks rally late on finance, telecom buying.
newsitem.headline: Thai stocks rally late on finance, telecom buying.

text.p: Thai stocks rallied late on Wednesday to close sharply higher as retail and regional buyers snapped up finance and communications stocks ahead of Sunday's general election, brokers said.
The SET Index finished up 25.83 points, or 2.71 percent at 79.51 in trade worth 6.024 billion baht. The SET-50 was up 2.63 points, or 3.61 percent to 75.51
"The market was gripped by election fever. People are positioning themselves in front of the poll," said Barry Yates, research director at the Multi-Credit Corporation.
